casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Rex WILES. No. 213P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
